sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM I_BOARD_RECORD_COMMENTS WHERE 1=1 AND RECORD_SEQ = #recordSeq#
SELECT *FROM I_BOARD_RECORD_COMMENTS WHERE 1=1 AND RECORD_SEQ = #recordSeq# ORDER BY SEQ DESC
SELECT *FROM I_BOARD_RECORD_COMMENTS WHERE 1=1 AND RECORD_SEQ = #recordSeq# AND SEQ= #seq#
sqlMap.procedure: DECLARE I_COUNT NUMBER; I_SEQ VARCHAR2(10) := #seq#; BEGIN SELECT COUNT(SEQ) INTO I_COUNT FROM I_BOARD_RECORD_COMMENTS WHERE SEQ = I_SEQ; BEGIN IF I_COUNT <> 0 THEN UPDATE I_BOARD_RECORD_COMMENTS SET CONTENTS = #contents#, MOD_DATE = SYSDATE, MOD_ID = #modId#, MOD_IP = #modIp# WHERE SEQ = I_SEQ; ELSE INSERT INTO I_BOARD_RECORD_COMMENTS ( RECORD_SEQ, PARENT_SEQ, DEPTH, SEQ, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_NAME, REG_IP ) VALUES( #recordSeq#, #parentSeq#, #depth#, I_SEQ, #contents#, #regId#, #regName#, #regIp# ); END IF; END; END;
sqlMap.update: UPDATE I_BOARD_RECORD_COMMENTS SET DEL_YN = #delYn#, MOD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE SEQ = #seq#
